    • getStateAnimation

      public java.lang.String getStateAnimation()
      Determines which state the player should be in, at different health intervals
      Returns:
      String: the animation name of the current state

    • manage

      public void manage​(boolean isJumping, boolean isSprinting, boolean movingRight, boolean movingLeft, boolean isStationary)
      handles situations do with player sprinting and jumping at the same time, moving left or right and if they are stationary
      Parameters:
      isJumping - Whether the player is jumping
      isSprinting - Whether the player is sprinting
      movingRight - Whether the player is moving right
      movingLeft - Whether the player is moving left
      isStationary - Whether the player is stationary
